title.narrative: # of governmental policies for sustainable and inclusive development that are better implemented as a result of CSO engagement;

description.narrative: Measures the number of governmental policies that are better implemented as a result of VCA efforts

comment.narrative:
The National Adaptation Plan of Action - (NAPA) (2007): Amendment: NAPA to include adaptative mechanisms for marginalised groups most especially the women, youth and PWDs since these are adversely affected by the climate crisis. In addition to ensure that the proposed adaptive interventions are cognisant of the different compounding vulnerabilities among the target group.
The National Climate Change Response Strategy - (NCCRS) (2010): Implementation: The programme will advocate for implementation of the strategy and adoption of appropriate climate change frameworks that are responsive to the effects of climate change on the population and sustainable development.
The National Climate Change Policy - (NCCP,). (2016): Implementation: The programme will advocate for the implementation of this policy because little is known about it across different governance structures at both National, district and sub-district levels.
Intended Nationally Determined Contributions - (NDCs) (2015): Improvement and implementation: Intentional budget allocations to Climate action by the government. Funding for climate action to be prioritised in all planning processes
Gender Equity and Equality Act No. 22 (2016): Amendment: of the policy to include equal access to and control of natural resources by the marginalised groups mostly women, youth and PWDs. This will enable the marginalised groups to own resources hence become co-creators of locally based climate solutions.
